alert.note: Alert for Concho; McCulloch (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern McCulloch and northeastern Concho Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 524 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, or near Millersview, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Doole and The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
